author: entertainment.ie
title: Travel | Hotel Deal of the Week: Hotel Westport
text:
Hotel Westport, Co. Mayo
CHRISTMAS EXTRAVAGANZA: €219pp – 5 nights Bed & Breakfast with Dinner each evening. No single supplement.
Join the team at Hotel Westport for a week of 'Christmas' inspired fun and activities. Holiday includes a four course dinner Sunday to Wednesday plus a Farewell Banquet on Thursday evening, Mulled Wine Reception, complimentary tea/coffee, free use of leisure centre with 20m pool & free transfer from/to local bus and train station. Also a full programme of activities and entertainment.
This is a midweek offer, valid November 22 to December 4, 2015.
www.hotelwestport.ie
